Description: Monitoring signal to ensure wholesale trading operations are active and functioning correctly.
Target setpoint for wholesale energy trading, defining the desired trading position or power level.
Monitoring signal for reserve power marketing activities to confirm system responsiveness.
Indicates the amount of positive Frequency Containment Reserve (FCR) provided to the grid.
Indicates the amount of negative Frequency Containment Reserve (FCR) provided to the grid.
Indicates the amount of positive Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve (aFRR) delivered.
Indicates the amount of negative Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve (aFRR) delivered.
Target setpoint for aFRR activation, defining the desired adjustment for frequency restoration.
Signal indicating activation for primary control power (frequency containment) in real-time.
Factor representing overfulfillment of FCR obligations compared to contracted values.
